name: Site preparation, state or private moist cold softwood forest, steep slope, INW
description: Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet undergone a formal validation process. Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average technology. Some data extrapolated from similar processes.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Region specific data on the level of resource consumption during site preparation is limited.  Estimates for these values were developed using a limited set of published data and through direct inquiries of forest nursery managers.
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: US Inland West including Montana, Idaho, and eastern Washington
